member.name: M:QRisk_API.Controllers.QRiskScoreController.Post(QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel)
member.summary: Return the 10 Year QRisk score
member.response: 200 is returned if a Prediction score has been calculated.
400 is returned if input cannot be processed (for example if the Age is out of range). Details will be in the returned response body.

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.Prediction.Results
member.summary: List of Prediction Scores

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.Prediction.Quality
member.summary: List of DataQuality checks, showing any substituted values

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.Prediction.Meta
member.summary: Metadata about this call to the API

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.Prediction.QRiskInputModel
member.summary: The data provided by the user for this Prediction. Identifiable fields are stripped of data and marked as **PI**

member.name: T:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel
member.remarks: Strict SNOMED definitions for all the below parameters are maintained by Endeavour Predict Using the definitions will ensure the highest possible data quality and consistency being fed to the API Please consult our website for further details on the definitions, which are also available in alternative terminologies. In Attended Mode, clinicians may use their clinical judgement to over-ride automated searches, however this may change the outcome of the risk estimation, and the user assumes all risk for this. IMPORTANT: IN ALL SITUATIONS QRISK3 MUST BE CONSIDERED AN *ESTIMATE* OF FUTURE CVD RISK, NOT AN ABSOLUTE GUARANTEE, AND MUST IN ALL CASES BE INTERPRETED WITH DUE CLINICAL CONSIDERATION TO THE PATIENT'S COMPLETE CLINICAL SITUATION. QRISK3 IS NOT A REPLACEMENT FOR CLINICAL JUDGEMENT.

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.CVD
member.summary: Patient has a diagnosis of CVD recorded at any time prior to the search date.

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.sex
member.summary: Assigned sex at birth.

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.age
member.summary: Patients age in years calculated on the search date.

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.atrialFibrillation
member.summary: Atrial fibrillation at any time prior to the search date.

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.atypicalAntipsychoticMedication
member.summary: On atypical antipsychotic medication? Second generation ‘atypical’ antipsychotic - prescribed two or more issues in the previous 6 months(includes amisulpride, aripiprazole, clozapine, lurasidone, olanzapine, paliperidone, quetiapine, risperidone, sertindole, or zotepine).

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.systemicCorticosteroids
member.summary: On regular steroid tablets? Systemic corticosteroids – prescribed two or more issues in the previous 6 months.

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.impotence
member.summary: A diagnosis of, or treatment for, erectile dysfunction,at any time prior to the search date?

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.migraines
member.summary: Diagnosis of migraine at any time prior to the search date?

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.rheumatoidArthritis
member.summary: Rheumatoid arthritis at any time prior to the search date?

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.chronicRenalDisease
member.summary: Chronic renal disease at any time prior to the search date?

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.severeMentalIllness
member.summary: Diagnosis of severe mental illness (psychosis, severe depression, manic depression, schizophrenia) at any time prior to the search date?

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.systemicLupusErythematosus
member.summary: Diagnosis of systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) at any time prior to the search date?

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.bloodPressureTreatment
member.summary: On blood pressure treatment? Diagnosis of hypertension at any time in the patient’s records AND On antihypertensive treatment if 1+ script in last 6 months prior to the search date. Antihypertensive treatment includes the following: Thiazides, Beta blockers, ACE inhibitors, Angiotensin II Antagonists, Calcium Channel Blockers. Patients should only be included if both criteria are satisfied i.e.on treatment and have a diagnosis of hypertension.

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.diabetesStatus
member.summary: Diabetes status

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.BMI
member.summary: Body Mass Index (kg/m^2). Acceptable/Credible Range: 18 to 47. The most recently recorded body mass index for the patient recorded prior to the search date recorded in the last 5 years.

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.ethnicity
member.summary: Ethnic group, chosen from the 17 categories used by QRisk3.

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.familyHistoryCHD
member.summary: Family history of coronary heart disease in a first degree relative under the age of 60 years recorded before the search date?

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.cholesterolRatio
member.summary: Cholesterol/HDL ratio. Acceptable/Credible Range: 1 to 12 The most recent ratio of total serum cholesterol/HDL recorded in the last 5 years

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.systolicBloodPressures
member.summary: Systolic blood pressure readings (mmHg). Acceptable/Credible Range: 70 to 210 The most recent systolic blood pressure readings prior to search date recorded in the last 5 years The order here is important, the readings in the list should be most recent first, ending with the oldest reading

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.systolicBloodPressureMean
member.summary: Latest Systolic Blood Pressure mean reading (mmHg). If provided will be used instead of the List of systolicBloodPressures

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.systolicBloodPressureStDev
member.summary: Standard Deviation for the systolicBloodPressureMean value

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.smokingStatus
member.summary: Most recent confirmed smoking status.

member.name: P:QRisk_API.Models.QRiskInputModel.townsendScore
member.summary: Townsend score. The Townsend score associated with the output area of a patient’s postcode. See: https://statistics.ukdataservice.ac.uk/dataset/2011-uk-townsend-deprivation-scores#:~:text=The%20Townsend%20Deprivation%20Index%20is,is%20available%20for%20that%20area).

member.name: T:QRisk_API.Services.CalculationService
member.summary: Method and supporting functions to call the QRisk3 calculator. Escapsulated in this PUBLIC class so it can be called from nUnit AND the API Controller

member.name: M:QRisk_API.Services.Extend.StandardDeviation(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Double})
member.summary: The is the SAMPLE version of StDev, rather than the POPULATION version. This is the correct one for use in QRisk3 See: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3141692/standard-deviation-of-generic-list

member.name: P:DataQuality.Parameter
member.summary: Name of the Parameter used by the Calculator

member.name: P:DataQuality.Quality
member.summary: Was the parameter provided OK, out of range etc?

member.name: P:DataQuality.SubstituteValue
member.summary: The value used by the calculator if the value provided was substituted

member.name: M:DataQuality.#ctor
member.summary: Quality report from the calculator, showing any substituted values for missing or out of range parameters

member.name: T:PredictionResult
member.summary: Contains the ID, Score and Typical score (if available)

member.name: T:Meta
member.summary: Contains MetaData about the prediction: timings, versions, etc

member.name: P:Meta.ApiVersion
member.summary: Build version of the API.

member.name: P:Meta.ApiTimeStampUTC
member.summary: ISO DateTime (UTC) that the API was invoked

member.name: P:Meta.CalculatorVersion
member.summary: Build version of the Calculator.

member.name: P:Meta.CalculatorResultStatus
member.summary: Status result from the Calculator.

member.name: P:Meta.CalculatorResultStatusReason
member.summary: Used to hold extra information if the Calculator was unable to produce a Score (reason for failure).

member.name: P:Meta.PerformedSystolicBloodPressureCalc
member.summary: True if we have converted a list of SystolicBloodPressures to the Mean and Standard Deviation. Details of the conversion will be found in a "systolicBloodPressures" DataQuality section
